page.title: 01 The Dell
page.content: { The Dell is the home of Southampton Football club who play in the first divison of the English Football League. It is situated in Milton Road. It was built in 1895 by Mr George Thomas for Â£10,000. The "Saints" went on to win several Southern League titles. In 1920-1921 they joined the newly formed 3rd Division South. Saints finished second in the first year and gained promotion to the 2nd Division by winning the League in 1921-1922. Saints have been in seven F.A cup semi_finals and three cup finals. They won the cup once beating Manchester United by 1_0 in 1976.Their most successful league season was in 1983_84 when they finished runners-up to Liverpool. After improvments the Dell can now hold up to 25,000 people.
